subtitle: affirmation for releasing anger and
frustration when anger comes up hanging
on to Old anger is a way to stay stuck
in the past and make yourself sick
there's nothing wrong with being angry
as long as we express it in a healthy
way and then let it go when you hold on
to anger for a long time it turns into
resentment and resentment hurts your
body and can lead to diseases like
cancer and
arthritis in this exercise you will be
able to let go of your anger with people
in your life you can do this exercise on
a regular basis to clear your
subconscious mind each time you do it
you may have different people or some of
the same people it doesn't matter our
clearing is done on levels and layers so
however you feel comfortable
remember that you are always safe and in
charge you can stop the exercise at any
time by opening your eyes taking a deep
breath and relaxing your body
completely to heal we need to understand
our feelings affirmations can help you
